snippet.title: Cairn: Mathair's Curse - Official Trailer - 2024
snippet.description:
Cairn: Mathair’s Curse is a turn-based story driven JRPG about a boy and his mother, in an epic story that explores love, loss and family. When a mysterious cult unleashes an ancient curse on their home, Alex and his friends must embark on an adventure, defeating wacky enemies, solving puzzles and meeting new friends along the way.

WISHLIST ON STEAM → https://store.steampowered.com/app/1302530/Cairn_Mathairs_Curse/

FOLLOW ON TWITTER →  https://twitter.com/RossGameDev

WEBSITE → https://www.cairngame.com/
